posts.title: Using Stable Diffusion To Tune 3D Morphable Model
posts.description: Going over SDS proposed in DreamFusion. Let's use a diffusion model and a morphable head model to create 3D heads fitting some text descriptions.

posts.title: How To Visually Evaluate Image Classifier Using StyleGAN2
posts.description: In this article, we’ll be evaluating an image classifier by exploring StyleGAN2 latent space. We’ll look at the performance of a hairstyle classifier that we use in Ready Player Me.

posts.title: AUV-Net: Paper Break-down, Part 1
posts.description: Aligning mesh textures with different topologies could be a fantastic feature for any 3D project. This would unlock numerous possibilities, such as texture transfer or novel texture generation. That’s precisely what the AUV-Net paper by Nvidia addresses. Let’s review the paper to understand its primary concepts.
